plays.text: Penalty to Marty Reasoner 2 minutes for Tripping Peter Forsberg
Goal scored by Rob Blake assisted by Milan Hejduk and Peter Forsberg
Penalty to Chris McAllister 2 minutes for Holding Georges Laraque
Goal scored by Alex Tanguay assisted by Peter Forsberg and Adam Foote
Goal scored by Jason Chimera assisted by Steve Staios and Mike York
Penalty to Shawn Horcoff 2 minutes for Boarding Vaclav Nedorost
Goal scored by Mike York assisted by Fernando Pisani and Brian Swanson
Goal scored by Alex Tanguay assisted by Peter Forsberg and Scott Parker
Penalty to Ales Pisa 2 minutes for Interference(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Steve Reinprecht assisted by Radim Vrbata and Joe Sakic
Penalty to Eric Messier 2 minutes for Hooking(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Greg de Vries 2 minutes for High Sticking Brian Swanson
Penalty to Alexei Semenov 2 minutes for Tripping Peter Forsberg
Penalty to Adam Foote 2 minutes for Interference Jason Chimera
